ProductList.name: Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G
ProductList.description: The real metal finish on the main camera adds unity to the design and accentuates the luxury of the haze texture. It’s a bold new camera design in a category of its own.

ProductList.name: Galaxy S20 FE 5G
ProductList.description: This is the phone made for people who want it all. It's packed with features tailor-made for fans on all kinds—whether you love photography, gaming or filling your feed with all that inspires you.

ProductList.name: Smart TV 82' QLED 8K Q800T
ProductList.description: Smart TV 82' QLED 8K Q800T, Powerful 8K AI upscaling powered by Neo Quantum Processor ensures you always get full 8K resolution.

ProductList.name: Galaxy Watch3 Bluetooth (41mm)
ProductList.description: Spend your time moving while Galaxy Watch3 Titanium tracks seven popular activities automatically. Get more out of each movement thanks to a built-in run coaching
